name: Network Management
description: Sector template for network management patents including monitoring, configuration, and orchestration.
contextDescription: Network management patents cover network operations and automation. Key areas include SNMP/monitoring (H04L43), configuration management (H04L41), network orchestration, and AIOps. High-value targets include Cisco, VMware, ServiceNow, SolarWinds, and cloud management platforms. Automation and AI-driven operations are growth areas.
scoringGuidance: Network automation patents target NetOps modernization.
Monitoring/observability patents target SolarWinds, Datadog, Splunk.
Intent-based networking patents are a Cisco focus area.
Multi-cloud management patents target hybrid enterprise environments.
AIOps patents apply ML to network operations.

questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the management function and operational value.

questions.question: Does this enable network automation or reduce manual operations? Automation is a key industry trend.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Network automation reduces OpEx and improves reliability.

questions.reasoningPrompt: Cloud network management is a growing market.
